contents: Article 5 (Organization) The committee shall be composed of at least 20 and not more than 30 members, including the following members. Revised 2017. 4. 3., 2017. 5. 15., 2020. 07. 29., 2022. 12. 26. 1. FISU and AUSF members of Korean nationality 2. Member sports organizations of required sports for the World University Games ( (If a university sports federation is formed within a member sports organization, the recommendation is made by the university sports federation.) Not more than 12 people recommended by the university sports federation *3. Up to 15 people recommended by the president or dean of a university that operates an athletics department of 5 or more sports *4. Efforts should be made to ensure that the ratio of specific genders among committee members does not exceed 70% of the number of registered members.
